definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once

sentences.english: The fundamental unit of the hierarchy is the association .
sentences.chinese: 等级系统中的基本单位是群丛。

sentences.english: Generally, you should try to make gradations in the notes involved.
sentences.chinese: 通常来说，你应该试着将所用到的音符划分等级。

sentences.english: With eight, very loosely related chapters, this book is hard to classify.
sentences.chinese: 这本书的八章自成体系，很难分出等级。

sentences.english: MHK is the shortened form of the Chinese Proficiency Test for Minorities in China.
sentences.chinese: MHK是中国少数民族汉语水平等级考试的简称。

sentences.english: How is the difficulty level for each word determined?
sentences.chinese: 每个词汇是如何归入不同的难度等级的？

sentences.english: Use of the Likert scale differed among instruments.
sentences.chinese: 在不同诊断工具间，对里克特等级的使用各不相同。

sentences.english: Despite all this, GE failed to save its top-notch credit rating.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，GE还丢掉了长久以来了最高信用等级。

sentences.english: There is also a hierarchy of offensiveness that needs to be observed.
sentences.chinese: 攻击性言语也分等级，这需要我们留意。

sentences.english: One book is available for each level of GFI.
sentences.chinese: 每个等级都配有一本练习册。

sentences.english: The divisions bonus pool is divvied up - in large part - on the basis of the rankings.
sentences.chinese: 部门的奖金总额很大程度上是按评估等级分配的。

sentences.english: Vidmaster Challenge: 7 on 7 (0 points) – Enter into any ranked or social playlist with 7 EXP on the 7th of the month.
sentences.chinese: 每个月的第七天以7点经验值进入任何等级赛或清单。

sentences.english: Fill out each box on the form on a 1-5 scale.
sentences.chinese: 按照一到五的等级来填写表格。

sentences.english: Eggs are graded from small to extra - large.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋从小的到特大的分成了等级。

sentences.english: The level of the open space determines the nature and hierarchy of the access.
sentences.chinese: 通达空间的层次决定了通路的性质和等级。

sentences.english: We're talking military grade, for multi-megaton ballistic weaponry.
sentences.chinese: 按我们所讲的军事等级，那属于热核弹道武器。

sentences.english: Civil services are organized in hierarchical structures of offices.
sentences.chinese: 文官是按照职位的等级制结构组织起来的。
